titles.title: School Safety Drill Research Act of 2023
School Safety Drill Research Act of 2023

To require the Secretary of Education to enter into an agreement with the National Academies to conduct a study on the possible mental health effects of a lockdown drill or active shooter drill in elementary and secondary schools, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
School Safety Drill Research Act of 2023
This bill requires the Department of Education to enter into an agreement with the National Academies of Sciences, Engineering, and Medicine to study and report on the mental health effects that may result from a lockdown drill or active shooter drill in elementary and secondary schools.
